Entry.en-US: {0_character} still feels fear, as does any sane {masculine_0:man:woman}, but {masculine_0:he:she} never lets it stop {masculine_0:him:her}. {masculine_0:He:She} has gained {1_ratingInt} {2_ratingName}.
Entry.it-IT: {0_character} prova ancora paura, come qualsiasi {masculine_0:man:woman} sano di mente, ma {masculine_0:he:she} non si lascia fermare da {masculine_0:him:her}. {masculine_0:Lui:Lei} ha guadagnato {1_ratingInt} {2_ratingName}.

Entry.en-US: More confident than ever in the face of danger, {0_character} has gained {1_ratingInt} {2_ratingName}.

Entry.en-US: {0_character} has been overcome by fear and has lost {1_ratingInt} {2_ratingName}.
Entry.it-IT: {0_character} è stato sopraffatto dalla paura e ha perso {1_ratingInt}. {2_ratingName}.

Entry.en-US: After recent exposures to danger, {0_character} has acquired new phobias and lost {1_ratingInt} {2_ratingName}.

Entry.en-US: {0_character} follows a strict regime, never taking the easy way if it is not the best way. {masculine_0:He:She} has gained {1_ratingInt} {2_ratingName}.
